text: An employee who takes leave pursuant to § 32-1202 shall not lose any employment benefit or seniority accrued before or during the date of such leave.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 36-1603.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-146, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 32-1201.

DC CODE § 32-1203

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Effect of leave on employment benefits or seniority.
